接口 com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.ImageWorker.LoadListener
的使用

    • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util中ImageWorker.LoadListener的使用

      参数类型为ImageWorker.LoadListener的com.opensource.bitmapfun.util中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static File ImageFetcher.downloadBitmap(Context context, String urlString, ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
      Download a bitmap from a URL, write it to a disk and return the File pointer.
      void ImageWorker.loadImage(int num, ImageView imageView, ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
      Load an image specified from a set adapter into an ImageView (override ImageWorker#processBitmap(Object) to define the processing logic).
      Bitmap ImageWorker.loadImage(Object data, Bitmap.Config config, ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
      Load an image specified by the data parameter.
      void ImageWorker.loadImage(Object data, ImageView imageView, Bitmap.Config config, ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
      Load an image specified by the data parameter.
      void ImageWorker.loadImage(Object data, ImageView imageView, ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
      已过时。 
      This method can be ambiguous to ImageWorker.loadImage(Object, ImageView, android.graphics.Bitmap.Config) when
      the third parameter is null.Use ImageWorker.loadImage(Object, ImageView, android.graphics.Bitmap.Config, LoadListener)
      instead.
